brain_inspired.name: Jay McClelland
brain_inspired.title: BI 030 Jay McClelland: Mathematical Reasoning and PDP
brain_inspired.text: Jay and I discuss his rather ambitious project to implement mathematical reasoning in an AI agent. Plus his prominent role in and experience of the history of parallel distributed processing and neural network architectures taking over symbolic “good ol’ fashioned artificial intelligence” in the 1980s, and lots more.
